lender.name: Emile
lender.loan_because: I just wanted to help someone, we are so blessed and I can't find a better way !!
lender.occupational_info: I help people acheive their finanacial goals !!

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: my life has been blessed and I want to give back. People living in developing countries don't have as many opportunities as we do in the US and I would love to help provide them with a little boost towards achieving financial stability. We tend to get caught up in our pampered lives and forget how little it takes to make a difference in the lives of people that are less fortunate than us.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to be without. And struggling to make ends meet. My parents never seemed to get ahead, and I find that I am able to help others. As my husband and I have done well for ourselves and feel that we can do this.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work for the federal government until this passed June when my husband and I decided to retire early and have some us time.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: This is one of the coolest things I've seen. What an amazing way to lend a hand to someone so far away. (2nd loan is because I play tennis!)

lender.name: Nellie
lender.loan_because: It's a way for me to do a little more globally.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a community psychologist in training.

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: I want people to be able to have a better quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I design and sell jewelry and I also paint watercolor portraits of people.

lender.name: regina
lender.occupation: house wife,trying to set up home business
lender.loan_because: i would like to help others and also help myself
lender.occupational_info: im a 57 year old born may 8th 1950 ,widowed military wife and my husband died of MS i also have 5 kids all are adults now but they are still my big babies an i love them to death

lender.name: Sarah & Adam
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can. We were especially inspired by the wonderful people we met on our travels to Southeast Asia.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I care about people and I love the idea that by giving a small amount of money I am able to assist someone in getting on their feet and being able to start their own business to take care of their families

lender.name: Keren
lender.loan_because: What is better than helping others help themselves? I want my 3 boys to grow up in a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a very nice spa, helping people relax and feel happy, performing services like facials, make-up application, and depilatory waxing (not relaxing but still beautifying).

lender.name: Aimee
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non profit organization providing services for those with a mental health diagnosis. (i.e. therapy, drug and alcohol services, assisted living/shelter, links to other community services, rehabilitation services, etc...

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to give back. Pay it forward!
lender.occupational_info: I am a graphic designer. And I love to take photos. Its more of a hobby than anything.

lender.name: Lyana
lender.loan_because: my mom is a war-baby from the Vietnam War, and she always tells me how lucky we are to live here in the US. I'm lending my money from my piggy-bank to help people from my mother's country.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 5th grade student in Fair Lawn, NJ.

lender.name: Douglass
lender.occupation: Retired president of sucessful sales organization.
lender.loan_because: Someone saw potential in me back in 1970 and that encouragement grew into a nationally recognized business for me and my family.
lender.occupational_info: I have owned a company that sells road hazard safety equipment which lessens the accident rate on our highways and road construction jobs.

lender.name: Nils Jonsson
lender.loan_because: “So in everything, do to others what you would have them do to you, for this sums up the Law and the Prophets.” — Jesus

lender.name: VIRGINIA
lender.loan_because: Helping others is the right thing to do. We are blessed to live in this country and should do what we can to help developing nations succeed.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: people have helped me in my life and I want to do the same for others, especially those trying to help and improve their lives and their families. It ripples outward to everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I started my own business just recently. I am a Freelance Executive Assistant/Office Manager/Bookkeeper.

lender.name: Samir
lender.loan_because: I feel like it.

lender.name: The Lang Gang
lender.loan_because: After seeing a report on Oprah I was moved to help. These people only need such a small amount to help change their lives forever.
lender.occupational_info: I process all incoming payments from customers for the company I work for.

lender.name: YUMIKO
lender.loan_because: I love the earth.I'm falling love with this beautiful world. I believe that all people will live a peaceful life.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good and I think it may change the life of someone.

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: My husband and I feel blessed by what we have accomplished in our lives. I came from a background of poverty and have done well so I wish to share my success with others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach health promotion to college students at West Virginia University

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to help single women/mothers become self sufficient.

lender.name: Gina Hanna
lender.loan_because: I believe that giving is what it is all about. I am a Christian and that is what God did for us and that is what he has asked us to do for each other. I believe it comes back in so many abundant ways.
lender.occupational_info: I help arrange loans for people to buy houses or to refinance their current house loan. I am also very involved in my church where I lead a drama ministry and help with the Children's ministry.

lender.name: Pearl
lender.loan_because: I want to help mothers take care of their families. What greater joy is there in life then seeing smiles on your kids faces. If my loan brings that to one mother - great! :)
lender.occupational_info: I sell vacation homes at a resort in Montana.

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed. I have traveled to 35 countries and lived outside the US so I know first hand what the living conditions are like in other parts of the world.

lender.name: anne
lender.loan_because: Micro lending is such an impossibly beautiful concept, it makes this planet a much smaller and intimate place. It takes very little to create the biggest change in other peoples lives. Dignity, honor, believing in others, that doesn’t cost anything - but a few supplies to help someone believe in themselves - I can manage that.

lender.name: Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: I consider it "paying it forward" for all the kindnesses I have received from people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach computers and the organization of information to students in my local community college.

lender.name: ria
lender.loan_because: I just wanted to help

lender.name: Stella
lender.loan_because: it empowers.

lender.name: Alisha
lender.loan_because: I believe in this project.
lender.occupational_info: I help children that have been abused.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my Christian duty to help those less fortunate than I.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with disabilities be successful in college

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I am keeping my mother's gift for helping alive eventhough she has passed on. I enjoy seeing how many women I touch on her behalf.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best idea - that people of a variety of income levels can help fund business ventures across the world! It makes me feel great.
lender.occupational_info: I provide administrative services for a city bus company.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I think this is an important way to change the world, one small step at a time
lender.occupational_info: I provide protection for architects and engineers who work in the United States, or worldwide

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I can ....and .....I feel good about doing it. A new blouse or helping to alleviate suffering???? It really doesn't take much. Since I have been blessed, I need to do my share to help others.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am such a strong believer in the power of having your own business. I support this program because I want others to help make the world a better place by developing their own businesses and themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I coach and train businesses and real estate agents as to how to make their businesses become more successful.

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: My faith calls me to be in service to others. Because my disability limits what I can do physically, making a loan to someone in need helps me to fulfill what Christ calls me to do. I have seen the success of other programs I have given to (such as the Heifer Project) and I believe helping people set up small businesses can have the same success.
lender.occupational_info: I retired from an Information Management position on a contract with the Government Accountability Office. I analyzed and indexed GAO's reports so users could easily find reports on topics they were interested in. I also did numerous database maintenance duties. Having read numerous GAO reports on agency inefficiency and poverty programs, I am inspired by how well KIVA works.

lender.name: The Buckner Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help others striving for financial independence
lender.occupational_info: We teach people how to make and save money

lender.name: Natural Luxe
lender.occupational_info: Natural Luxe specializes in natural, organic, recycled, handmade and sustainable gifts with style and substance!

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I like to help people and I believe everyone deserves a chance to seek what is positive and important to them.
lender.occupational_info: I help the elderly at an Assisted Living Facility and I also sell Health and Wellness products

lender.name: Candice
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have a wonderful family and beautiful home. Sharing and giving to others that have the ability to make the world a better place makes me very happy.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with my two beautiful children. I fell that its my responsibility to raise considerate and caring children so they can also give back to the wold when they are older.

lender.name: Our Family in
lender.loan_because: Simple actions make a difference. It brings us joy to think our small loan can be a blessing to someone, somewhere.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel so good to give to other people and when you give, God's return is double. As the old saying goes, it is better to give than receive!
lender.occupational_info: I have a wonderful husband and two healthy boys! I also, coach 7 girls on a high school cheerleading squad.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I Can!
lender.occupational_info: I am a legal asisstant in a busy law office here in Wyoming. I love to loan money here in KIVA..This is a GREAT organization and I am proud to help.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: A small group of dedicated people can change the world.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I see this as a stepping stone towards making this world a better place. We all deserve a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I want to help hardworking people.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: Life is about Giving. Success is 'Significance' - making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I coach women who are going through personal and professional transitions.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I can help people get started with businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work programming computers.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I would like to do something that makes a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that offers evaluation services and assistance with program planning and design for human service programs.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It''s how I can help change the world.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I am honoring a friend who requested "a random act of kindness" for her 60th birhtday and I was fortunate enough to have someone give me a loan to start my business 25 years ago.

lender.name: Tammy & Keith
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in someones life.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have the opportunity to receive an education. I want to help create opportunity for the awesome, hard-working entrepreneurs on this site.
lender.occupational_info: I am pursuing my masters degree and lisence to become a MFT..

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: As a follower of Christ I am called to care for the poor, the marginalized, and the oppressed. Giving in this capacity gives me the opportunity to share His love and help to empower those that He cares about so deeply.

lender.name: Arlene
lender.loan_because: It is time to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I help send people on holidays around the world. I specialize in Africa and adventure travel.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I feel good when I help someone who is less fortunate than myself make a life for themselves and their family. Anything is possible in this world with hard work and determination. Those interested in this deserve a chance no matter what country they live in. Strangers helping strangers - what a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from working. When I did work I was an office manager in a doctor's office. I love the work of medicine and helping others.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I realize how blessed I am to have been born in this country. I have a great family, a supportive husband and a great job. I want to help others who are trying very hard to do something with their lives. Someone who may not have access to the resources available to us in this country.

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: I want to see other entrepreneurs succeed. It's important to support independent businesses, no matter where they are in the world.
lender.occupational_info: My specialty is helping businesses market and promote their services, primarily thru copywriting and creative ideas.

lender.name: Charese
lender.loan_because: I like being able to make a big difference in someone's life with just a little amount of money. I don't have much now and hopefully someday I will be able to help more. I know that I wouldn't be where I am now without the help of student loans.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in pharmacy school. I will graduate in 2010. I recently got married May. I work in one of America's top ten hospitals. I help take care of patients there by making and delivering medications. I have a big heart and enjoy helping others.

lender.name: Lorie
lender.loan_because: I think that this is a wonderful way to help people support themselves and their communities. This seems so much better that just donating money to general "assistance" organizations.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase run-down residential properties, rehabilitate them and fix them up for new families to purchase for thier homes.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: this can really make a difference. I've seen it first hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization that does international exchange and development programs for people with disabilities

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed to have a wonderful life. I believe it is important to teach our children to help others and give back.

lender.name: Zak
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to get a business off the ground and how much you need others to help you.
lender.occupational_info: I play music.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: if we all share something with each other, we will all have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stone carver and I sell my work at a public market in Seattle Washington.

lender.name: Mykle
lender.loan_because: Giving makes you feel alive.
lender.occupational_info: I help students get their college education.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe micro lending is the best, most viable path toward self-sufficiency and ultimately eradicating poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a volunteer (with abused children and homeless/low-income adults), a writer (freelance and children's books) and a communications consultant (writing/editing/design for different businesses' marketing pieces).

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for all that I have and it feels great to help others!!!!
lender.occupational_info: Provide services to non-profit organizations.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of the solution. With so many people involved, it takes so little to provide hard working people the opportunity to succeed. What a great chance for all of us to do a little something to change the world!

lender.name: Arconnehi
lender.loan_because: to make a difference to someones daily life. To help uplift, promote to their highest good. I am learning daily what it means to give out of my connection to all and everything.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: The buzz is great!

lender.name: Sophie Livingstone
lender.loan_because: I have seen through my work how important giving someone a break can be in turning their life around.
lender.occupational_info: Giving young people a chance to give a year and change the world by spending 10 months serving their community in schools as tutors, mentors and role models.

lender.name: Charli
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jessika
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed so I think the least I can do is help others
lender.occupational_info: just work

lender.name: Reliable IT Solutions
lender.loan_because: I believe that capitalism works only if solidarity is one of its main components. I believe in the good will and hard work of all human beings.It's time to lend a hand, from one business to another.
lender.occupational_info: I provide IT technical services and support to Small and Medium Businesses in the Miami-Dade and Broward counties area.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed
lender.occupational_info: I develop software for a business specializing in electronic commerce.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: All people need an opportunity to succeed. I volunteer in my community and this is a way of helping in another part of the world.

lender.name: Antoine
lender.loan_because: As Madonna sings in "Sky Fits Heaven", "Fate fits karma so use it. That's what the wise man said to me. Love fits virtue so hold on to the light. That's what our future will be."
lender.occupational_info: I design and layout magazine spreads, create posters, post cards, illustrate and many other artistic things to make something visually attractive to an onlooker or reader.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: People have helped me when I needed it.

lender.name: Entrepreneurs for Africa
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of using entrepreneurship as a way to lift people out of poverty and empower them to build better lives for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: When people share on my site, we donate to Kiva entrepreneurs! On EvanCarmichael.com we help business owners go from nothing to something. We've helped over 14 million entrepreneurs by giving them the motivation and strategies that they need to become successful.

lender.name: Eugenia
lender.loan_because: I love the opertunity to help those who want to achieve and better their community and their family.

lender.name: Mabel Campuzano
lender.loan_because: God loves me and I want to share that love with others. Every one needs a hand including us sometimes, so why not help when you know that you have enough?
lender.occupational_info: My work is to let people know that there is a God that loves you and cares for you if you let him.

lender.name: Dalia
lender.loan_because: I want to help others reach their goals...
lender.occupational_info: I am a recruiter for a healthcare consulting firm. I find people to work for my company.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: everything I have is a loan from God for making a better life for His children.
lender.occupational_info: I teach World Geography and American History to children between 11 and 14 years old.

lender.name: LifestyleDesigner.Net
lender.loan_because: A small business owner myself, I understand the amazing lifestyle benefits business ownership provides. I love the idea of helping others achieve greater success in their ventures so they can spend time enjoying their families rather than just providing for them.
lender.occupational_info: I help people and businesses solve problems so they can live the lifestyle of their dreams. Hey, that's the same thing Kiva does!

lender.name: Amber
lender.occupation: Program Director for a non-profit organization

lender.name: Keli
lender.loan_because: Why not? My money can sit in account earning a tiny bit of interest or it can do something good.
lender.occupational_info: We make games to play on the internet (www.pogo.com). It is pretty nice to get paid to make people's lives more fun.

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: It's a chance for me to help make a difference in someone's life in a developing country. I think this site is great because it connects you with real people in need, whom you would never have normally come into contact with.

lender.name: Edna
lender.loan_because: It is so fulfilling to know a little help can go a long way.

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: every human being should have the opportunity to live with dignity.

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: IT

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a foundation that does work in the U.S. and Africa.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I'd rather gamble on people than play the lottery.
lender.occupational_info: I run the office for the labor union of the Art Directors Guild, whose members design movies and TV shows

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves the opportunity to grow their business.

lender.name: The Family Next Door
lender.loan_because: We believe that anyone wiling to leave the world of poverty through hard work and commitment to self improvement should have an opportunity to realize their dream.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization that helps support families living with neuromuscular diseases.

lender.name: Mercedes E.
lender.loan_because: my small amount coupled with a few others will provide someone in need of a jumpstart to realize their dream.
lender.occupational_info: Commercial Real Estate Broker in Manhattan.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: It is a good thing to do. If you can.
lender.occupational_info: The eyes and ears to the RN in a hospital setting.

lender.name: Evangeline
lender.loan_because: I have run a business myself and know first-hand how difficult it can be to access capital when you need it. I've also traveled to many developing countries and have a special love for entrepreneurs in those areas.
lender.occupational_info: Previously, I managed employees who make software. Now I volunteer with Kiva.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I work for a large successful organization that has changed many lives. Our founder started in his garage 40 years ago like many small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Account manager for a large clothing company. I manage the relationship between my customers and our company.

lender.name: philippe
lender.loan_because: it is important to find a place where each of us can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: Police officer in NYC

lender.name: T - F - F
lender.loan_because: Kiva has found a creative way to help people help themselves,
lender.occupational_info: Property Management, Real Estate Investing and Facilitator of Fuel Commodities JP 54, D2, BLCO

lender.name: anne
lender.loan_because: I am a business owner and I think that what these people are doing for their lives with a small loan is just incredible!

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: it may help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I administer a government run training program that teaches firefighters and policemen how to respond to natural or human caused disasters.

lender.name: Bob & Heather
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to make a big difference in someone else's life. I've been there and I know. I also admire the entrepreneurial spirit!
lender.occupational_info: I oversee the assembling and the distribution of a newspaper.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: We all have the ability to change the world for the better, one person at a time. Helping others in need is one way to accomplish this.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired superintendent of an elementary school district in San Jose, California.

lender.name: Monette
lender.loan_because: I am happy to help people that are hard working but have limited means.
lender.occupational_info: I work in accounting and real estate part time.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: We need to work together to make the world a better place for everyone

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the opportunities I have been given to succeed and to pursue my dreams. I believe that having more than enough to live comfortably brings responsibility with it. I'm excited about the ability provided by Kiva to connect so directly with entrepreneurs in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I do various administrative tasks (including paying bills) to help run the company I own with my husband. I also care for our three young children.

lender.name: Zach and Heidi
lender.loan_because: there is no better feeling than helping someone else.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have been truely blessed in my life.
lender.occupational_info: office manager

lender.name: Evelyn Pearl Johnson
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to know that I have helped someone else fulfull their dream!
lender.occupational_info: I work for Southwest Airlines at our internal help desk.

lender.name: The Walnut Group
lender.occupational_info: The Walnut Group is a student organization at the University of Michigan dedicated to raising awareness and funding for efforts to eradicate extreme poverty. We strive to promote economic and social development initiatives outlined by the eight Millennium Development Goals (MGDs) of the United Nations Millennium Project. Micro-credit programs are also supported by The Walnut Group in countries where traditional, collateral-based, financial opportunities do not exist. Additionally, our academic community functions as a unique setting of intellectually curious and globally conscious students to whom The Walnut Group provides the opportunity to travel and support impoverished communities first hand.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I want tp help and thought this sounded interesting.
lender.occupational_info: I loan money for people to own their own home.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I enjoy reaching out to people all over the world, and to help in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an eye doctor's office. I enjoy helping the patients look better and see better, too!

lender.name: BJ Reed
lender.loan_because: support the spirit
lender.occupational_info: i love to work with colors and cloth

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: it is a very personal way of making a difference in another person's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired employee of the United States government, who now works part time as the Religious Education Coordinator at my parish.

lender.name: ahmed
lender.loan_because: to pay my school fee
lender.occupational_info: am a student of one of the university in my country.i suppose to resume back to school,but now am at home jobless.please help by give loans to pay my school fee,so that i can start lectures with my friends in school.thanks and God bless you.amen

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I feel like I am making a difference to someone who is willing to take responsibility for their lives. It makes me feel good inside.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make their homes a place of beauty, comfort; a retreat from the busy world we live in.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: It is a great gift being able to know that my contribution is helping to make a difference for a specific person/family.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive change in our world.

lender.name: Karen,Scott,Brandon
lender.loan_because: Better to give than receive.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.occupation: community liason for Home Health Agency

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: We are all here to help each other regardless of where we live or who we are.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner myself I realize how difficult it is to maintain a business or start a new one without a little help. It's so little and means so much.
lender.occupational_info: We sell acrylic sheets, resins, mold making supplies, etc.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: God has given me so much; it is fun and exciting to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I work in business and trade stocks.

lender.name: ana
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to the comunity
lender.occupational_info: I take care of new mothers and their newborn children.

lender.name: Charles E.
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people lift themself out of poverty .
lender.occupational_info: I'am responsible for the openiong and closing of the church , I'am also responsible for the safety of the Pastor and the Congergation when whenever we meet for service .

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to and it's a great way to help other entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I own a retail store in California that sells new and used video games and DVD movies. I have been a business owner for 16 years and I can't imagine doing anything else.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I believe applying the venture capital model to areas of the world that haven't traditionally participated in the global economy has the ability to reduce global poverty
lender.occupational_info: I work in finance.

lender.name: Jim & Lee
lender.loan_because: We are happy to help people who are helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Jim is a retired television director and instructor from Ball State University. Lee is a school psychologist. She finds ways to help children with learning problems to succeed at school.

lender.name: Carolyn& Deryl
lender.loan_because: We wish to give back some of the blessings we have received.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired elementary teacher, now working in Real Estate with husband and son.

lender.name: Marinus Henk
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do to help others.

lender.name: ERIN
lender.loan_because: When you send good into the world it comes back a thousand times over.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses manage their travel program.

lender.name: Lisa and family
lender.loan_because: I love the way Kiva allows me to be able to invest into other people's lives, in such a direct and personal way. God has blessed my life in so many ways and it is a joy to be able to share that blessing with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am the nurse manager of a clinic that helps people who suffer from chronic pain. But I have always felt a call on my heart to work with needy people in developing nations, and hope to be able to do that full-time, after my children finish college.

lender.name: Paulin
lender.loan_because: The best moment of my day is pressing the lend button. As an entrepreneur who started with nothing, I deeply appreciate the moment....it makes my heart sing. Life is good. Carry On!
lender.occupational_info: I work long hours helping people to achieve their life and financial goals, and I truly enjoy what I do. They say all people must endure either the pain of regret or the pain of effort.....I find the effort of sharing brings me no pain, but limitless true joy.

lender.name: Bazinet Family
lender.loan_because: We believe it's better to give an hand up instead of a handout. Lets all help make the world a better place!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a consultant for a large software company.

lender.name: Sharon L
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I manage the shoe department at a large store

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I show everyone the benefits of good skin care and protection using all botanically based products that do not include any harsh chemicals or mineral oil. And there is NO animal testing.

lender.name: Moanikeala
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others
lender.occupational_info: I'm a wife and mother of two wonderful kids.

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: I want to help people thrive and I love God!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently unemployed.

lender.name: Jann
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to do something positive for another person.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to help others in emergency situations with CPR and First Aid. I also teach yoga.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I love knowing that I can help someone better their life with such little impact to my bank account, plus it helps me sleep better at night!
lender.occupational_info: 24-7 Mommy Duty

lender.name: Len & Andrea
lender.occupation: business owner and womens coat buyer

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: Kind gestures go along away. I was brought up in a family where giving was second nature. My portfolio includes a picture with my mom. My mom taught me the true meaning of helping others by offering time, service, clothing, food, money, etc. 'You may be better off but you are never better than anyone.'
lender.occupational_info: I work with management to minimize risk related to technology by auditing controls in computer systems that are becoming increasingly critical to the operations of their organizations.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: it's such a fantastic way to make a real difference in someone's life. And it's an investment that keeps on giving.

lender.name: Eddy
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is a good way to give back. So many people over the years have helped me emotionally and spirtitually and I felt that this would be a good way to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I design resortwear for men and women.

lender.name: Joe & Lynnell
lender.loan_because: I have two, and they have none.

lender.name: Angel
lender.loan_because: "We make a living by what we get. We make a life by what we give". ~Winston Churchill
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student in marketing, but I hope to work in market research when I am finished. I hope combine my educational experiences in both psychology and marketing to investigate consumer behaviour.

lender.name: Jack & Lyn Barbour
lender.occupation: Lyn owns an Ad Agency/Jack is in IT
lender.loan_because:
We feel a need to make a difference in the world. Kiva allows us to give directly to a deserving person and give them a leg up in the world.
It's cool!

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I cannot afford not to.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone in need of a better life.

lender.name: Maximilian
lender.loan_because: We're all citizens of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I study medicine

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: I know people sometimes need a little extra help in getting started of what they want to accomplish, whatever it may be. In this case, it is money, and I am more than happy to help another in need!
lender.occupational_info: My work is hard to explain! I work for a clinical research company that coordinates testing with drugs or medical devices in hospitals on patients to make sure that they are safe for people to use!!

lender.name: Tracii
lender.loan_because: I need to share what I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: I create wedding cakes. I share in one of the most spectaular days of people's lives.

lender.name: Ronnie & Tish
lender.loan_because: It is more blessed to give than to receive; everything we have belongs to God -- He simply entrusts us to manage what is already His!
lender.occupational_info: I teach people about Jesus & help them to get connected to Him through the local church

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to help give others an opportunity to lift theirselves up. To make a better life for them and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I work with severely disabled high school children. Teaching them living and job skills.

lender.name: Cordie
lender.loan_because: Because I want to help. People need help sometimes. I am glad they can turn to Kiva and get the assistance they need. I am also a parent and I see that many of the people invovled with Kiva are parents that need help. I feel like I am helping to improve the life of a child. I know that will bring their parent a sense of peace that cannot be bought. I believe it is important to help families build a strong life and stay together.
lender.occupational_info: The work that I do helps business people manage their business and keeps them in line with all the government tax filings.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone acheive their dream. And, I believe that when a person has been very blessed by God that giving to others when possible is something one should do.

lender.name: Geraldine
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people get their business up and running and be able to support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am an office manager for a group of mortgage brokers.

lender.name: Nancie
lender.loan_because: people must help each other in whatever ways they are able.

lender.name: Janet & John
lender.loan_because:
And do not forget to do good and to share with others, for with such sacrifices God is pleased. Hebrews 13:16
We also lend because of the Butterfly Effect - meaning that small actions can cause ripple effects that have the potential to produce immense change. We pray that our small loans assist in creating meaningful, positive change in someone's life.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Chad
lender.occupation: retail manager- studying to become a teacher

lender.name: elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I may not have as much as some people, but I am blessed enough to have more than others. God has given my family and I everything that we need. I loan to let God's love flow through me and my family.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Dentist. We fix peoples teeth. I help by answering the phones and making appointments.

lender.name: Starthrower
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of "The Starfish." Any one individual can affect the life of another in the smallest of givings.
lender.occupational_info: Mother of two boys, wife to one man, and nurturer of many.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I love seeing other people thrive. Everyone should have the opportunity to make their dreams come true.

lender.name: Jo Ann
lender.loan_because: It's a pleasure to reach out and make a difference in people lives. I just love it.
lender.occupational_info: My passion and hobby has turned into a business. Specializing in Wreaths for all seasons. Creating beauty is my passion.

lender.name: Satu
lender.loan_because: "You make a living by what you get. You make a life by what you give.” Winston Churchill
lender.occupational_info: I work for local government in a community development office hoping to make a small difference in the lives of others.

lender.name: Zlata
lender.loan_because: As war survivors, my husband and I used to dream about somebody somewhere who can help us to go trough the difficult time. We survived. It is my turn now to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I spread my knowledge about the language(s) and culture of my people.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: I believe in grass roots.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a medical school/hospital and I coordinate the schedules of 3rd year med students studying Ob/Gyn

lender.name: Chris & Shelsy
lender.loan_because: Ralph Waldo Emerson once said: "To appreciate beauty, to find the best in others; To leave the world a bit better, whether by a healthy child, a garden patch, or a redeemed social condition; To know that even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded." We’re all on this crazy blue marble together – Let’s help each other “succeed”!
lender.occupational_info: Shelsy is a Critical Care Nurse. Chris works for the U.S. Food and Drug Administration.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupational_info: I clean up the "messes" that zoo animals make; but really I find myself wanting to become more involved in environmental and species conservation and the zoo is a great resource for this

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I am disappointed with how I was deceived by Kiva. I specifically chose recipients of the loans because they were not planning to open meat markets or to raise and sell animals. I cannot ethically support people slaughtering animals for the health of the animal and for the health of the human. Until Kiva can assure me that my money is not being pooled to be LENT to anyone in their system, but to who I choose, I choose not to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I wish to promote sustainable plant-based agriculture and nutrition. Sustainable = pesticide and petroleum-based fertilizer free as well as exclusively for plants for human consumption. I don't wish to support crops for animal feed, chemical sprayed food, or production of animals or animal by-products for food. Organic, plant-centered!

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life - and hope to help someone make a difference in their own life.

lender.name: Jo and Peter
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed.
lender.occupational_info: We help raise money to teach children how to play guitar in low income communities.

lender.name: leigh
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: Why not?!

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: "There is a wonderful mythical law of nature that the 3 things we crave most in life-- happiness, freedom, and peace of mind--are always attained by giving them to someone else"- Peyton Conway March
lender.occupational_info: I help people obtain their dream of home ownership by assisting them in finding the home of their dreams and guiding them in obtaining financing to meet their needs. I also help sellers to sell their property.

lender.name: Tracy B.
lender.occupation: Business Management Student & Student of Life
lender.loan_because: We are all citizens of the same world...
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be manage the business goings-on and accounting in a major hospital. I will be responsible for overseeing marketing, public relations, accounting, and patient care.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: To make a difference in the world and to help wipe out poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a locomotive engineer, which is a person who "drives" trains, and delivers freight across the US.

lender.name: Dick
lender.loan_because: My son set an example for me
lender.occupational_info: I train people to work in other cultures.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I feel if we helped each other the world would be a better place.

lender.name: Papa Bill
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with more than I need and want to share with others who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Am retired from sales management and now have a web site promoting solar power. Live in a fully functional home using only the sun and wind for "power"!

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: My grandson came to us from an impoverished country and I want to give back to the world. Although I am so grateful that he is ours I my wish is that I can help poor mothers keep their children instead of feeling that giving them up is their only option
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my son who was injured in the military. He is in a wheelchair and requires me or someone else to be with him constantly

lender.name: Shauna & Kelly
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: I feel it's important to help others through their struggles. Knowing that others struggles are eased abit through my donation is a blessing
lender.occupational_info: Work in finance and provide advice to First Nations on governance practices.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: “Money is like manure; it’s not worth a thing unless it’s spread around.” - Thornton Wilder

lender.name: Cypress Creek Farm
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to have the opportunities that come with living in America ! I want women in other countries to know that we care about them and are willing to help make their lives better . . .
lender.occupational_info: It is a joy to help other people - I look forward to seeing how these small loans can help others work to improve their lives. . .

lender.name: Radhika
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lender.name: shea
lender.loan_because: I would like to help the individuals rather than their corrupt governments.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in International Studies and German Language. I have studied abroad in the Czech Republic for a year and currently volunteer in the International Studies/Study Abroad office to help others study another culture.

lender.name: Yue and Ding
lender.loan_because: Such a great way to help.

lender.name: The Chicago Tafia
lender.loan_because: It is a good opportunity to make a difference in peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: The promotion of our home country: Wales in the Chicago area.

lender.name: Maryann
lender.occupation: VP of Compliance and Risk Management
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life and it's time to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an insurance company where we provide health insurance to low income individuals, including Medicaid beneficiaries. I am the Vice President of Compliance, which means that I help my company understand the rules and laws it has to follow.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: it brings me great joy to contribute to the dreams and personal goals of others.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital lab and run tests that Doctor's order for the health of their patients.

lender.name: Sakina
lender.loan_because: It is a simple way to help other people.

lender.name: anthony
lender.loan_because: I have traveled around the world and know how fortunate i am to have been born without want.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help people.

lender.name: Tove
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed in my life; I want and need to share the blessings.
lender.occupational_info: Manage the accounting functions of several small businesses.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I will be spending 4 years of my life learning and not getting a chance to really help any one. At least this way I can do something without having much money of my own.
lender.occupational_info: In 2 years I will be a doctor, but my interests for a specialty are still too large to narrow down.

lender.name: Eshan
lender.loan_because: I make my parents more giving

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I want to do something to eradicate poverty
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired nurse, but currently work as an Episcopal deacon

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I would like help to make a difference in someone's life

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I want to help people. I dont have a whole lot to give, but I get joy out of knowing that the little I do give will help someone out alot!

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great idea

lender.name: Jahangir
lender.loan_because:
I want to help other people. :o)
Everyone should be able to live their dreams.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: An act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.

lender.name: Misty
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes the little bit of money that I can offer seem important.
lender.occupational_info: I have a beauty shop in the basement of my house. My customers drive to my house to have their hair cut, colored, permed, or styled.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I know there are hard working people out there who do not get a chance to live to their potential because of financial strain.
lender.occupational_info: I do books/finances for my husband's business. I know where all the money goes and I can account for every penny. So I know how a little goes a long way or the other way around.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Love to help others succeed

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: This is what Jesus would have me to do.

lender.name: elspeth
lender.loan_because: I care about the people in other countries. and if I can't pyisiclally go down there to help, then I can at least send some money.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home and look after my children. my husband has a good job, so I don't have to go out to work to earn money.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I BELIEVE EACH PERSON HAS THE CAPACITY TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE... I want to make a difference in the lives of women and encourage them to realize their dreams even when times are difficult and challenges arise. I hope the loans I'm able to provide help women feel supported and give families the opportunity to send their children to school.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to write sales, marketing, educational and promotional materials for a large health care company in the United States. Through my work, I communicate the benefits of good health care to others. In my spare time I like to make films, act, travel, cook, and eat!

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: someone helped me when I needed it, time for me to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: Sheet Metal HVAC, installing duct for major buildings.

lender.name: maria isabel
lender.loan_because: I like to help people in need.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: If a doctor, lawyer, or dentist had 40 people in his office at one time, all of whom had different needs, and some of whom didn't want to be there and were causing trouble, and the doctor, lawyer, or dentist, without assistance, had to treat them all with professional excellence for nine months, then he might have some conception of the classroom teacher's job.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I am blessed, and because it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time mother of four, busy soccer mom, avid volunteer and full-time graduate student.

lender.name: Clara
lender.loan_because: I am able. I can see that the money is going to make a difference and I appreciate the effort these people are making in working toward a goal that will improve their lives and the lives of the children who often depend on them.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I choose to lend this money to help less fortunate people achieve and accomplish there goals and dreams in life.
lender.occupational_info: I take phone calls in customer service for people who are inquiring about life insurance.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I have enough to share.
lender.occupational_info: I help people become better teachers and leaders.

lender.name: Mia
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info:
I am currently working as a Stage Manager and Event Manager. This means that I work with all the technical and design elements to make sure a production or event runs perfectly smoothly.
Also, I have recently started a non-profit, community theatre organization. I have worked in many fields and lived/studied in Israel, Burkina Faso, and France. I travel when I can because I believe that the world is a small place in which we are all people, one family.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I feel that if your able to give just a little bit, you can make such a difference in someones life.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I am blessed
lender.occupational_info: I help make new medicines available

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Jesus said, “love thy neighbor.”
lender.occupational_info: I a serial and social entrepreneur. Work primarily in marketing and communications. I have a passion for making a difference in the world.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I love to see my babysitting money get put into good use by someone who really needs it.

lender.name: Richard & Kelly
lender.loan_because: Our lives are filled with so many blessings. Being able to share it with others is one of the best.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed and like the idea of helping others. I think that a program like this where people are empowered to improve their circumstances with a little start up help is truly inspired.
lender.occupational_info: I train people how to use computers.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I have been richly blessed by God and it is a privilege to give a hand up.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and feel that it's important to share these blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I tutor elementary age children who are dyslexic in the Grand Rapids Public Schools.

lender.name: Leo
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: analyze data to help companies become better at marketing.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: There is no better way to live than to give!
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell their homes, hopes and dreams. How lucky am I to help people with something as important as thier home!

lender.name: McCormick Family
lender.loan_because: God has placed this on my heart to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get a college education so that they can better themselves.

lender.name: Bart & Paula
lender.loan_because: We think it is so wonderful to be able to help people to help themselves all over the world. It's a win win. These people get the help they need to make a better life for themselves and their families and we can use that same money to help someone else once it's repaid. Talk about the gift that keep on giving!! It's a phenomenal concept and we are so proud to be able to be a part of it.

lender.name: Bianca
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I design websites.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: I like to improve people's lives. It gives me great joy to help.

lender.name: Beebee
lender.loan_because: as the human race, the people of Earth we can do much better than what we have been doing. Help who you can, globally, locally.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a not for profit affordable housing group and I am a Mom.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in peoples lifes.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with many things and I want to share with those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am self employed and have a very easy business. I am blessed and very grateful for what I have.

lender.name: Daisy
lender.loan_because: Bow wow
lender.occupational_info: Bark bark

lender.name: Scott & Mark
lender.loan_because: We've heard about these microloan programs for some time and love the idea of being able to help someone directly to build their own business.
lender.occupational_info: We create websites and also run several travel related online directories.

lender.name: Tomas
lender.loan_because: I believe in good and honest ideas from hard working people.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm a management consultant. I visit companies and help them improve their goals and plan changes for their businesses. I help them plan, and help them achieve better results.
I'm also an artist :)

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: We can and should

lender.name: cindy
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women success in business.
lender.occupational_info: My work is great, because I get to talk with other people who want a better life for them and they children. I teach other parents how to make money, saving money the same time.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I want to support those with the courage to dream...
lender.occupational_info: I am a child custody mediator for Superior Court. When couples divorce or split up, I help them make plans for their children, so that children are able to keep relationships with both parents.

lender.name: Chandra
lender.loan_because: Sharing a little with others make me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: A single mother of a teenager, I work seven days a week as an Administrative Coordinator at a University

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: I would like to help make a better life for as many people as possible.
lender.occupational_info: I own an air conditioning and refrigeration company.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to give ... I want to make a difference ... I believe in karma ... I believe in "paying it forward" ... I believe it is simply the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: As an energy practitioner, I offer Reiki and EFT sessions both in-person and long distance. As a professor, I teach music history and music theory online. As a consultant, I help start-ups with set-up, human resources, strategic planning, human development, recruiting, network marketing, editing, and system hardware/software troubleshooting. Basically, I help people! :-)

lender.name: Glen
lender.occupation: in transition to a new career
lender.loan_because: I loan because I know the power of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the state of California.

lender.name: ShaKima
lender.loan_because: Feels good to help others achieve their dreams and aspirations~
lender.occupational_info: To ensure smiling faces to all people I encounter.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to struggle to get a head. I know the feeling of just needing a little more money, and I could do what I want to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Beauty Consultant with Mary Kay. I buy Skin Care products and makeup and sell it to customers. I give women makeovers and show them how our products work.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.occupation: Professor, English to Speakers of Other Languages
lender.loan_because: I know it works! I believe in giving people a chance, and we can't rely on governments to solve socio-economic problems.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to adult immigrants. My students come mostly from Latin America, but I also have some from Asia and the Middle East.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I can, shouldn't everyone?

lender.name: Rosanna
lender.occupation: real estate broker and corporate travel manager
lender.loan_because: I'm selfish! ;-) Giving is the ultimate expression of Love, for it is Love itself!
lender.occupational_info: I do several things. I manage the corporate travel program for a large shopping mall developer/manager. I am also a licensed independent real estate broker.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: It is the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children with disabilities ages 14-18.

lender.name: viva
lender.loan_because: I get a great deal pf pleasure out of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I make clay pieces that decorate ones home or garden.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I make coffee and other beverages.

lender.name: harold & gina
lender.loan_because: We are in a position to help, and this is a tremendous organization that assists small businesses and families. We feel that by lending, it gives the people a sense of pride and ownership.

lender.name: Shellie
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give!

lender.name: renee
lender.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunities that I have had in my life. If my donations can help someone live a life that makes them happy, a life that allows them to support their familes, then I'll have done what I wanted to do through Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large telecommunications company. I work in project management and support certified SIx Sigma managers who use data to identify processes that can be changed to save the company money.

lender.name: Micheline
lender.loan_because: Christ my God asked me to

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: of selfish reasons...I feel good when I give. It's like Christmas year-round! :-) I've seen the amazing things that this and other programs like this do for people and I'm so grateful that I can be part of it. Thanks Kiva!

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Sharing is a requisite for caring.

lender.name: Joanne N Joan
lender.whereabouts: Livingston and Big Pine Key TX and Florida
lender.loan_because: In a small way we can help someone have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Using fabric we create art , soft sculptures and pictures that we show in Galleries in Key West, FL, Big Pine Key, FL and Dollywood, TN.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to have a good life.
lender.occupational_info: I stay home to raise my two daughters. It's a gift I don't take for granted.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is the right thing for me to do. I believe that each of us can do one thing, small or large to help change the face of the world. Everyone deserves to live their best life.
lender.occupational_info: I support the local public Middle School Special Education Dept.. offering services and support to all children with learning disabilities.

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: I want to give a handup not a handout.

lender.name: Mojgan
lender.loan_because: I know these people work hard and don't have much and yet they are full of life and are so appreciative of what they have, I just want to be a part of all that.
lender.occupational_info: I love people and love to help.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.occupational_info: I work in a law office that defends poor people who cannot afford a lawyer. I am also a writer.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: We are all born equal, but do not all have the same opportunities. I have been fortunate in my life and hope that my small sacrifice of monies will be a "hand-up" that some others need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a paramedic who provides medicine and emergency care to sick and injured people. I live 50 km south of Philadelphia.

lender.name: Chloe
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate with what I have and want to help others.

lender.name: Adriana & Daniel
lender.loan_because: It gives us a chance to give to someone who is making a change or chance at their dream. We see it as "paying it forward".
lender.occupational_info: Adriana is a stay at home mom with a background in the medical field. Daniel has been at his job for 14 years.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because:
"You must be the change you wish to see in the world".- Mahatma Ghandi
When we get a chance to help, lets just do it.

lender.name: Lloyd
lender.loan_because: God blessed me and I wish to share this blessing with those less fortunate, but willing to work for what they receive.
lender.occupational_info: I am fortunate to be able to be in a win-win-win situation. I save businesses money on their phone bills and in turn retain their business for the particular telephone company, and in return receive a small commission. We ALL benefit!

lender.name: Sharona
lender.loan_because: I just think it is incredible to be able to loan $25 to help someone change their life...it is the least I can do for now...it feels great!!!!!

lender.name: Kevin & Jessica
lender.loan_because: If we all help a little, many people will be helped a lot.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I have been incredibly blessed in my life. Despite my disability, I have the good fortune to be able to afford many assistive devices. I want others to be able to feel as independent in their lives despite their hardships.
lender.occupational_info: I used to manage a large OB/GYN department at a local hospital.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Bridget
lender.loan_because: Not only am I priveleged to assist people all over the globe, but as they repay and the money is reloaned, they are empowering each other! How incredible is that?

lender.name: Steve and Gayle
lender.loan_because: of our Peace Corps experience and we have the funds to do so.We enjoy watching people improve themselves by their own hard work.

lender.name: Mrs G
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I design and monitor the development and production of a fashion line.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I have a lot of admiration for someone who starts their own business and I think this is a wonderful program to allow people to support entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I have a little boy who is the greatest challenge I have ever undertaken. He also gives me the most joy I have ever known!

lender.name: Taren
lender.loan_because: Its great to know that a small donation can help someone else build their future and become a business owner.
lender.occupational_info: I work with clients helping them feel better about who they are and encouraging more entrepreneurs. My goal is to build a legacy for my family and to continue to make a positive impact to those I come in contact with.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because:
I wouldn't be in the position I am today if I didn't have some assistance along the way. This seems like a great way to impact peoples lives in a positive way.
If my small contribution can help a person develop, grow, and expand an income stream that improves the lifes of them and their families, then it's worth every penny.

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: I knew in my heart that giving to others would be right. I felt a connection with Miguel. God bless you and your business.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I know what getting a loan can do to help someone who wants to better their life.

lender.name: Jade
lender.loan_because: I saw the web site on Oprah so I wanted to help people in other places. It makes me feel good that i'm helping people. Thats is why I loan.
lender.occupational_info: I don't have a job I go to middle school. My middle school is in Las Vegas. In middle school I learn math,reading, and so on so forth.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing.
